ygData.subject: Re: Hammer of Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: well...i cant give you exact info cause im at work... but, i believe the damage (6) stays the same for the later hammers... just the delay decreases.. you will
ygData.messageBody:
well...i cant give you exact info cause im at work...
but, i believe the damage (6) stays the same for the later hammers...
just the delay decreases..
you will find the higher level hammers are quite ineffective.

Dank Skunksage
-the Rathe


At 07:38 PM 7/23/99 -0000, you wrote:
>From: devotion_con@...
>
>Hello, all.
>
>I have been using the Hammer of Wrath since level 9. I have looked all
over the web to find the stats of the later hammers I can summon, but have
been unable to find them. Could somebody let me know the stats for the
other hammers? Thanks. I know they aren't the best in "ratio", but they
will always be my favorite because they are a gift from Rodcet Nife.
>
>Also, while lurking I have noticed a lot of complaints that there aren't
any cleric only weapons in the game. Heh. Who else gets to use the Hammer
of Wrath? :)
>
>Devotion
>Guildmaster - Clerics of Norrath Povar
